title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Unlock Advanced Model Training: Reinforcement Fine-tuning on Bedrock (AIM3327)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 解锁高级模型训练：Bedrock上的强化微调 (AIM3327)
abstract: Organizations struggle to customize AI models for complex tasks due to the extensive human annotation required for traditional fine-tuning approaches. Learn how Amazon Bedrock's new Reinforcement Fine Tuning (RFT) capabilities enable developers to train models using custom evaluators instead of large labeled datasets. Discover how to implement RFT with Amazon Nova and open-source models using techniques like RLVR for code generation and RLAIF for AI feedback. We'll demonstrate how these RL-based customization methods improve model accuracy, safety, and adaptability for enterprise applications while reducing the burden of data annotation.
abstract_cn: 组织在为复杂任务定制AI模型时面临困难，因为传统微调方法需要大量的人工标注。了解Amazon Bedrock新推出的强化微调(RFT)功能如何使开发人员能够使用自定义评估器而非大型标注数据集来训练模型。探索如何在Amazon Nova和开源模型上实现RFT，使用RLVR等技术进行代码生成以及RLAIF进行AI反馈。我们将演示这些基于强化学习的定制方法如何提高模型准确性、安全性和企业应用的适应性，同时减轻数据标注负担。

presenter.name: Shalendra Chhabra
presenter.title: Senior Manager, Product Management, Amazon Bedrock
